thread.title: Kevin Gilbert
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Kevin Gilbert

author: Kevin Gilbert
title: Kevin Gilbert
text: The show room was very neat & orderly. I liked the variety and styles furniture, lots of selection. My sales associated was also very professional, I did'nt feel rushed or pressured in my purchase, so 5 stars to my sales associate Stephanie too. A furniture purchase is a long term commitment so you want to be confident that you chose right and I do.
